posts.post_content: Indestructible Aura does *not* make creatures Indestructible, nor is it an Aura. Indestructible Aura *does* prevent your boltbait from getting [Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bolt)ed.
posts.html:
Indestructible Aura does not make creatures Indestructible, nor is it an Aura. Indestructible Aura does prevent your boltbait from getting Bolted.
